```{r Clean workspace}
#| include: false

rm(list = ls())
```

```{r List all used packages}
#| include: false

packages <- c("tidyverse")
```


```{r Install missing packages}
#| include: false

install.packages(setdiff(packages, rownames(installed.packages())))
```

```{r Load packages}
#| include: false

lapply(packages, require, character.only = TRUE)
```
